Class Graph

java.lang.Object
fr.u_paris.gla.project.idfm.Graph
public class Graph extends Object
A Graph which contains all information about the network

  • Constructor Details

    • Graph

      public Graph(String name)
      Create the graph with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the graph.

  • Method Details

    • addSommet

      public Sommet addSommet(Sommet sommet)
      Add a Sommet to the graph. If the graph contains a Sommet with the same name and approximately the same coordinates, it returns the existing Sommet. Otherwise, it adds the provided Sommet to the graph.
      Parameters:
      sommet - The Sommet to add to the graph.
      Returns:
      The added Sommet or the existing Sommet if one with similar characteristics already exists.

    • getSommets

      public List<Sommet> getSommets()
      Return the list of Sommets in this Graph.
      Returns:
      The list of Sommets in this Graph.

    • getSommetsById

      public List<Sommet> getSommetsById(String name)
      Return the list of Sommets which have the same name in this Graph.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Sommets to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The list of Sommets with the specified name in this Graph.

    • getSommetByNameAndRouteId

      public Sommet getSommetByNameAndRouteId(String name, String routeId)
      Return the Sommet with the specified name and route ID in this Graph.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Sommet to retrieve.
      routeId - The route ID of the Sommet to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Sommet with the specified name and route ID, or null if not found.

    • getNameLineById

      public String getNameLineById(String name)
      Return the name of the line by the ID of the line.
      Parameters:
      name - The ID of the line.
      Returns:
      The name of the line with the specified ID, or "Nothing" if not found.

    • getRouteId

      public Set<String> getRouteId()
      Return the set of route IDs in this Graph.
      Returns:
      The set of route IDs in this Graph.

    • getAretes

      public List<Liaison> getAretes()
      Return the List of Liaison of the Graph

      public void afficheLigneById(String name)
      Print the Line in the shell by the ID
      Parameters:
      name -

    • reseauComplet

      public void reseauComplet()
      Add the whole network contained in the CSV file to the Graph. The CSV file must follow a specific format: [description of the format]. This method reads the CSV file, creates Sommet and Liaison objects accordingly, and adds them to the Graph.

    • calculateDistance

      public static double calculateDistance(double lat1, double lon1, double lat2, double lon2)
      Calculate the distance between two points on the Earth's surface given their latitude and longitude.
      Parameters:
      lat1 - The latitude of the first point.
      lon1 - The longitude of the first point.
      lat2 - The latitude of the second point.
      lon2 - The longitude of the second point.
      Returns:
      The distance between the two points in kilometers.

    • reseauComplet1

      public static ConcreteTransportGraph reseauComplet1()
      Create a ConcreteTransportGraph representing the whole network contained in the CSV file. This method reads the CSV file, creates ConcreteStop objects, adds connections between stops, and constructs a ConcreteTransportGraph object representing the entire network.
      Returns:
      The ConcreteTransportGraph representing the network.

    • getMinMaxCoord

      public List<Double> getMinMaxCoord()
      Return the minimum and maximum coordinates of the StopEntries contained in the Graph

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
